text: Lublin Voivodeship is one of the 16 voivodeships of Poland. It can be found in the southeast Poland and in west Lesser Poland. The capital city is also named Lublin. It was created on January 1, 1999. Polesie National Park and Roztocze National Park are both in the voivodeship. == References == Category:1999 establishments in Poland
title: Lublin Voivodeship
